evolution.title:
The Great
Financial Shift
evolution.desc: The world is upgrading. Move from physical limits to digital light velocity.

0.title: Primitive Era
0.subtitle: Traditional Cash
0.desc: Physical, slow, and restricted by borders. Prone to inflation and theft.
0.back_desc: Physical cash has served humanity for centuries, but in a digital-first world, it faces challenges like inflation and geographical restrictions. The global economy is moving towards more efficient, digital forms of value exchange.

1.title: The Friction Gap
1.subtitle: TradFi & Cards
1.desc: Hidden fees and 3-5 day delays. You don't own your money.
1.back_desc: Traditional banking systems, built decades ago, often involve processing delays and intermediaries. Modern financial solutions aim to reduce friction, enabling faster and more transparent transactions for everyone.

2.title: The Digital Proxy
2.subtitle: Mobile Wallets
2.desc: Apple/Google Pay. Convenient, but still tied to failing legacy rails.
2.back_desc: Mobile payment solutions popularized digital transactions, offering convenience over cash. However, they typically rely on traditional banking rails. The next step is a truly decentralized financial layer.

3.title: The Financial Reset
3.subtitle: Crypto & Web3
3.desc: True ownership and 24/7 global liquidity. The bridge to freedom.
3.back_desc: Blockchain technology introduces true digital ownership and 24/7 global liquidity. It represents a fundamental shift in how value is stored and transferred, independent of centralized intermediaries.

4.title: ELITE VELOCITY
4.subtitle: Pintopay QR
4.desc: Instant, global, P2P settlements at $1/minute velocity. The ultimate infrastructure.
4.back_desc: Pintopay leverages the power of decentralized networks to facilitate instant, borderless settlements. By participating in this ecosystem, partners contribute to a faster, more inclusive global financial fabric.

income.title: Earn $1
income.desc: Traditional finance is a <1>walled garden</1>. As a <3>Pintopay Partner</3>, you are the bridge. Every global transaction becomes your dividends.

network.title: Viral Network Effect
network.desc: When you build a network, your income disconnects from time.

waiting.title: The Cost of Waiting
waiting.desc: While you trade hours for a fixed wage, the Digital Economy generates value 24/7. <1>Every minute you wait is a tax on your potential</1><2>Unlock the strategy to stop calculating loss and start capturing value.</2>

virtual.title: Mastercard Virtual USD
virtual.desc: Pay contactless in-store or online in 180+ countries
virtual.bonus_text: on your balance after card activation
virtual.back_desc: Create 1-time cards for every subscription. Netflix, Spotify, Amazonâ€”they never get your real data. Cancel instantly. You are a ghost in the machine.

physical.title: Mastercard Physical
physical.desc: Premium soft-touch PVC card with worldwide delivery
physical.back_desc: Looks like a bank card. Works like a bank card. But it connects directly to your crypto liquidity. No bank account needed. Total separation of state and money.

platinum.title: Platinum Metal
platinum.desc: Solid metal construction with concierge service
platinum.back_desc: Access 1,200+ airport lounges. Concierge service that answers in seconds, not minutes. High limits. Zero questions. This isn't just a card; it's a diplomat's passport.

modal.title: Premium Status Required
modal.desc: Platinum cards are exclusively reserved for our most active partners. Upgrade your network value to unlock legendary status and concierge services.

18.title: Viral Studios: The Unfair Advantage of PRO Membership
18.excerpt: Unlock 24/7 automated marketing tools that do the selling for you. This is how the elites grow their network.

19.title: Pintopay Sovereignty: Designing Your Global Empire

brief.title: Partner Briefing
brief.goal_desc: Our mission is to build the world's largest decentralized partner network. <1> Your goal is simple:</1> Expand the network, earn XP, and unlock the <3>$1/minute passive income stream.</3>
brief.manual_step_1: Share your unique invite link with potential partners.
brief.manual_step_2: Help them activate their account and complete tasks.
brief.manual_step_3: Earn XP for every active partner in your network (up to 5 levels deep).
brief.rule_1_desc: Do not spam or invite fake accounts. Our Anti-Bot Detector is active 24/7. Fake invites will result in a permanent ban.
brief.rule_2_desc: Focus on active users who want to build. Inactive bots degrade your network score.
brief.motivation_desc: The more XP you have, the higher your rank. Higher ranks unlock exclusive benefits, lower fees, and the legendary Physical Platinum Card. Don't just participateâ€”dominate.

legal.disclaimer_desc: We are a community of digital nomads and online entrepreneurs who search for global trends. We act as a <1>Third-Party Ambassador Agency</1> and do not have an official corporate connection to Pintopay.
legal.risk_warning: All fast-growing trends include risks. Please conduct your own due diligence.
legal.copyright: Â© 2026 Ambassador Agency. All rights reserved.

terms.1_desc: By accessing and using this platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.2_desc: We operate as an independent Third-Party Ambassador Agency. We are a community of digital nomads and entrepreneurs analyzing global trends. We utilize marketing materials and referral systems to promote potential opportunities.
terms.3_desc: We explicitly declare that we have no official employment, ownership, or direct corporate connection to Pintopay. We act solely as independent affiliates/partners.
terms.4_desc: Participation in digital economy trends, crypto assets, and fintech opportunities involves significant risk. Past performance offers no guarantee of future results. You should perform your own due diligence before making any financial decisions.
terms.5_desc: In no event shall this agency or its contributors be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on this site.

privacy.1_desc: We respect your privacy. We strictly collect only necessary data to facilitate your partner journey and improve user experience.
privacy.2_desc: Any information you provide is used strictly for communication, delivering promised educational materials, and facilitating access to partner tools.
privacy.3_desc: We may use third-party analytics and tools to optimize our services. These parties have access to your information only to perform these tasks on our behalf.
privacy.4_desc: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it.

academy.hero_desc: Master the 100-Stage roadmap to <1>$1 Per Minute</1> with AI Automation.
academy.lock_desc: Stages 21-100 contain our most elite marketing secrets. Upgrade to PRO to unlock the full Career Stair.
academy.elite_training: Welcome to the elite training floor. To reach the result of <1>$1 per minute</1>, we must first master the art of <3>leverage</3>.
academy.profit_quote: Value is not in the work you do, but in the systems you scale. A partner with a 10,000 node network earns while they sleep, because their AI works 24/7.
academy.growth_hacker: In the year 2026, manual marketing is dead. You need to become a <1>Growth Hacker</1>. This means using viral loops where every new member brings 3 more.
academy.ai_desc: Our exclusive PRO engine generates viral content on autopilot 24/7. It auto-posts to your target audience while you focus on scaling. This is how you spend less time and reach maximum results.
academy.build_empire: Step-by-step, we will build your empire. By Stage 20, your foundation will be unbreakable. Beyond that, we enter the world of high-ticket sales and AI domination.

hook_rule.title: The 3-Second Hook Rule
hook_rule.desc: You lose 80% of viewers in 3 seconds. Here is the formula to keep them.
hook_rule.content: 1. Disrupt Pattern (Visual/Audio). 2. State Big Benefit. 3. Open Loop (Curiosity).

algorithm.title: Algorithm Hacking 2026
algorithm.desc: How the new AI feed really works.
algorithm.content: Engagement velocity > Total Likes. You need comments in the first 10 mins.

psycho.title: Psychological Triggers
psycho.content: Fear of Missing Out (FOMO), Greed (Profit), and Tribalism (Us vs Them) are the top 3 drivers.
